p: To prevent potential bias during phylogenetic inference due to recombination, sequences of all 88 ZIKV genomes were first analyzed with Recombination Detection Program version 4 (RDP4 program) [ 13] (University of Cape Town, South Africa) that incorporates seven methods: RDP, Gene Conversion, Chimaera, Maximum Chi-squared, Bootscan, Sister-Scanning, and three Sequences, to uncover evidence for recombination events. Only events with P values â‰¤0.01 that were confirmed by four or more methods were considered to be recombination events.
